column2: Clinical Exam (with lesion photograph if possible)
Confirm tumor staging with CT or MRI scans of the head and neck and chest
Vital Signs (i.e., temperature, heart rate, respiratory rate, blood pressure, body weight, and height³
Blood Samples (if possible) for correlative studies (immune, photosensitizer & biomarker analyses 7
HCG urine or serum for women of childbearing potential
